echo.message: Targets available:
'ant screencapture' to compile screencapture shared library
'ant jawtrenderer' to compile jawtrenderer shared library
'ant ffmpeg' to compile ffmpeg shared library
'ant portaudio' to compile jnportaudio shared library
'ant speex' to compile jnspeex shared library
'ant g722' to compile jng722 shared library
'ant hid' to compile hid shared library
'ant hwaddressretriever' to compile hwaddressretriever shared library
'ant video4linux2 (Linux only)' to compile jvideo4linux2 shared library
'ant galagonotification (Linux only)' to compile galagonotification shared library
'ant localhostretriever (Windows only)' to compile LocalhostRetriever shared library
'ant directshow (Windows only)' to compile jndirectshow shared library
'ant aegeturleventhandler (Mac OS X only)' to compile AEGetURLEventHandler shared library
'ant sparkle (Mac OS X only)' to compile sparkle shared library
'ant win-coreaudio (Windows Vista, 7 and 8 only)' to compile jnwincoreaudio shared library (use -Darch=32 or -Darch=64 for cross-compiling)
'ant mac-coreaudio (Mac OS X only)' to compile jnmaccoreaudio shared library
'ant quicktime (Mac OS X only)' to compile jquicktime shared library
-Darch: cross-compile for 32-bit (-Darch=32), 64-bit (-Darch=64) or ppc (-Darch=ppc, Mac OS X only) targets. Windows users have to use gcc >= 4.5.
-Dx264: path to x264 directory (ffmpeg JNI compilation).
-Dlame: path to lame directory (ffmpeg JNI compilation).
-Dffmpeg: path to ffmpeg directory (ffmpeg JNI compilation).
-Dportaudio path to portaudio directory (jnportaudio JNI compilation).
-Dspeex: path to speex directory (jnportaudio/jnspeex JNI compilation).
Please note that external libraries such as ffmpeg, x264, lame, portaudio and speex have to be compiled
(follow READMEs in relevant directory) before trying to compile libffmpeg and libjnportaudio
When compiling libffmpeg you have to tell ant script the directory of ffmpeg and x264 with
-Dffmpeg=/path/to/ffmpeg and -Dx264=/path/to/x264 -Dlame=/path/to/lame
When compiling libjnportaudio you have to tell ant script the directory of portaudio and speex with
-Dportaudio=/path/to/portaudio and -Dspeex=/path/to/speex
